tba

Class Odometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • tba.Odometer

  • public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Object
    The Odometer class keeps track of the position and angle that the robot has moved. It uses the information given by the wheel motor's sensors, which tracks how many revolutions have been made, and produces other valuable information needed for the robot's functionality.
